channel.title: CVE Feed for ConnX -- ESP HR Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ConnX -- ESP HR Management

item.title: CVE-2024-7269|2024-08-28T10:29:48.889Z -- connx -- esp%20hr%20management
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation vulnerability in "Update of Personal Details" form in ConnX ESP HR Management allows Stored XSS attack. An attacker might inject a script to be run in user's browser. After multiple attempts to contact the vendor we did not receive any answer. The finder provided the information that this issue affects ESP HR Management versions before 6.6.
